Wrinkles...

Millions of women have them, hate them, and want to get rid of them.

Wrinkles appear when skin loses elasticity. To get rid of them, it’s necessary to increase collagen production.

Skin care products can’t independently influence collagen levels. They don’t penetrate deep layers of skin - they only moisturise from outside.

Mezoroller makes cosmetics 40 times more effective by allowing them to penetrate deeper and work from the inside.

Mezoluxe works towards results instead of making empty promises

Nourishes

Go Ahead!

60 seconds 3 times a week

step
1

Cleanse skin with your normal facial cleanser

step
2

Using mild pressure, gently roll back and forth at the same intensity on the treatment area 5-10 times in each of the four directions – horizontally, vertically and diagonally. Roll over each side of face, chin, lips, forehead and neck. Do not force the roller into your skin

step
3

Following treatment, apply ANTIAGE serum
